title: Mini-Ep 98: Serums and Screw-Ups
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 98: Serums and Screw-Ups
itunes:subtitle: This week, Kate and Doree hear from long-distance friends sharing some self-care time together, recommend serums for a listener seeking to maintain their glow, and hear from listeners about the peeing-in-the-shower discussion. Plus: some sex talk. W...
description:
This week, Kate and Doree hear from long-distance friends sharing some self-care time together, recommend serums for a listener seeking to maintain their glow, and hear from listeners about the peeing-in-the-shower discussion. Plus: some sex talk.


We love to hear from you! To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.


This episode is sponsored by: 


  • AERA - Go to aeraforhome.com for 20% off diffusers and free shipping with the code FOREVER35.
  • BANILA CO - Try Banila Co’s original cult classic cleansing balm designed with make-up lovers in mind at BanilaUSA.com and use code FOREVER35 for 10% off your purchase.
  • STITCH FIX - Get started today at stitchfix.com/forever35 and you'll get an extra 25% off when you keep all items in your box.
  • HONEYBOOK - Get 50% off your first year when you go to honeybook.com and enter promo code FOREVER35.
  • MOLEKULE - For $75 off your first order, visit molekule.com and enter FOREVER75 at checkout.
  • HONEY - Use code FOREVER at joinhoney.com
  • HELLO FRESH CANADA - For a total of $70 off your first 3 weeks of HelloFresh, go to HelloFresh.ca/forever70 and enter code FOREVER70.


Theme music by Riot.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
